name: lumen (itch) (shepherdz)
description:
“什么才是治愈”，我们尝试用这样的游戏来回答，这个游戏鼓励大家去探寻人与人之间的陪伴与需要

被同龄人排挤的聋哑小男孩遇上了遭受家庭暴力的小女孩，一段追寻心中的明灯，冲破内心的黑暗，实现自我救赎，互相治愈的故事。

Wasd操控灯光移动

"What is the cure?" we try to answer with this game, which encourages people to explore the company and needs of people

A deaf mute boy who is excluded by his peers meets a little girl who suffers from domestic violence. It is a story of seeking the light in their heart, breaking through the darkness in their heart, realizing self redemption and mutual healing.

WASD controls light movement
